power_consumption.description: Power consumption in Watts per hour for different runner types

ubuntu.description: Standard 2-vCPU x86 Ubuntu VM, based on a D4as_v4 from Azure

windows.description: Standard 2-vCPU x86 Windows VM (higher due to OS overhead)

ubuntu-arm.description: 2-vCPU ARM64 Ubuntu VM (more efficient), based on coparm1-4c-16g instance from Scaleway

macos.description: Apple Silicon M-series (3-vCPU, very efficient) - TODO find estimates

macos-13.description: Intel-based macOS (older, less efficient) - TODO find estimates

grid_carbon_intensity.description: US average carbon intensity in grams CO2e per kWh for 2024, from https://ember-energy.org/

pue.description: Power Usage Effectiveness - ratio of total data center power to IT equipment power. Accounts for cooling, power distribution, and other overhead
